General.Name: Cowell Development Tbk
General.Description: PT Cowell Development Tbk develops, constructs, and sells houses, shop houses, and lots of land in Indonesia. It engages in the projects of apartments, residential and commercial properties, and offices. The company was formerly known as PT Karya Cipta Putra Indonesia and changed its name to PT Cowell Development Tbk in August 2007. PT Cowell Development Tbk was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia. PT Cowell Development Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Gama Nusapala.
